title: WarrantyPromise
description: A structured value representing the duration and scope of services that will be provided to a customer free of charge in case of a defect or malfunction of a product.

allOf.description: Structured values are used when the value of a property has a more complex structure than simply being a textual value or a reference to another thing.

durationOfWarranty.description: The duration of the warranty promise. Common unitCode values are ANN for year, MON for months, or DAY for days.

warrantyScope.description: The scope of the warranty promise.
